review: This app is completely useless. It won't let me add items to my order, I just get bouncing french fries that never end. I closed the app and went to Wendy's instead.
app chooses when it wants to work
would give a lot better score if my points didn't dissappear... I don't care if theyre not used for 20 years they're my points I paid for.. you guys owe me 40,000 points.
